com.thinkaurelius.titan.graphdb.query.vertex

Class VertexCentricQuery

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.thinkaurelius.titan.graphdb.query.BaseQuery
      • com.thinkaurelius.titan.graphdb.query.vertex.BaseVertexCentricQuery
        • com.thinkaurelius.titan.graphdb.query.vertex.VertexCentricQuery
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ElementQuery<TitanRelation,SliceQuery>, Query

    public class VertexCentricQuery
extends BaseVertexCentricQuery
implements ElementQuery<TitanRelation,SliceQuery>
    A vertex-centric query which implements ElementQuery so that it can be executed by QueryProcessor. Most of the query definition is in the extended BaseVertexCentricQuery - this class only adds the base vertex to the mix.
    Author:
    Matthias Broecheler (me@matthiasb.com)
